page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: Most people have pets.The favourite pet was the dog. The favourite meal was roast beef.The favourite drink was tea,beer and coffee.Only 2/3 eat sweets regulary.2/3 of the people eat foreign food. All people listen to the radio.1/3 listens 1 hour a day,and half listen more than 1 hour a day.3/4 have a daily paper. Half the people exercise regulary. 3/4 think fashion is important and 3/4 wear jewellery. Half have been abroad.Whitby is the favourite holiday spot and next Spain. Half the people go on holiday every year. Most of the people use Thornaby shops as they are convenient and they offer a wide range of merchandise.3/4 have a manual job.
